items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and comfortable!
items.body: I really don't enjoy dressing up or wearing dresses, so when I was on the hunt to find something cute to wear for a girls night out I ordered a number of dresses to try on and this was the one I went with. I love it! It is sooo comfortable and love how it fits my body shape (wider at the hips). It hugs all the right places. The dress is super soft & stretchy and kept me warm as I wore this on a very cold winters night. It has pockets and is very well made. I felt really comfortable and cute in this dress that I'm thinking about ordering a few other colors. I usually am in between a L and XL but since this was stretchy I went with the L and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: nicolaherring

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a fall wedding
items.body: Lovely and comfortable. I got so many compliments on the color! Needed for a fall wedding and it was perfect. I ordered a medium. I’m 156 and 5’3 so it was a perfect fit. I’d say it it’s definitely more of a heels vs flats dress but you will look beautiful in whatever your comfortable in. Read more
items.author: Essence Wimes

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size, drapes well, fabric not breathable
items.body: as advertised, drapes, well and true to size. Fabric is not breathable. Read more
items.author: Tracey B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: It is beautiful on my daughter. So flattering, perfect fit Read more
items.author: Ashley Evans

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not flattering!
items.body: The dress I received is not sewn like the listing photo. Instead of laying smooth across the bust, it bunches up awkwardly in the center which is not flattering. (See photos) When I move my arms, the wristbands creep up and get stuck on my forearms. I may have gotten a lemon but overall this dress was not worth the cost and having to go through the hassle to return it. No complaints about length, color, material thickness, or skirt flow. Read more
items.author: E Bingham

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Love this dress. Nice fit, beautiful color. Read more
items.author: Tammy Y

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m buying another one- different color
items.body: Loved this- comfy warm elegant AND POCKETS Read more
items.author: Shivani Grail

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!!!
items.body: Beautiful dress; true to size! Read more
items.author: LeAnn Darst

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Plum, Wine Red, Olive Green, Grey Blue, Dusty Pink, Orange Red, Black, Champagne, Caramel, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
